message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I could go down to $100 for it.  What do you say?
I'm still a bit short on budget, so I was thinking $92. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
